remarks: Deduction forming an implication from the antecedents of two premises, where a decidable antecedent is negated.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 26-Mar-2018.)
statement:
jaddc.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( -. ps -> th ) ) ) $.
jaddc.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> th ) ) $.
jaddc $p |- ( ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( ( ps -> ch ) -> th ) ) ) $.
